name: gallery_item
description: Individual wedding gallery item for Love Stories section

photo_count.description: Number of photos in the gallery

wedding_story.description: Link to the real_wedding blog post to pull photos and data from

card_cover_image.description: Custom cover image for the card (different aspect ratio than modal hero). If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

card_title.description: Override the couple names on the card. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

card_subtitle.description: Override the date/season on the card. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

card_location.description: Override the venue/location on the card. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

modal_hero_image.description: Custom hero image for modal header. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

modal_title.description: Override the couple names in modal. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

modal_date.description: Override the wedding date in modal. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

modal_location.description: Override the location in modal. If not set, pulls from linked wedding.

title.description: e.g., "The Giant White Pine of 1932" or "Harold Selmer's Dairy Years"

heritage_content.description: Rich text editor for the main heritage story content

hero_image.description: Primary historical photo for this story

photo_gallery.description: Supporting historical photos for the story

locations_featured.description: Specific locations on property or in area

venue_connection.description: How this historical element connects to the current wedding venue experience

is_featured.description: Show prominently on heritage blog homepage

og_image.description: Image for social media sharing (will use hero_image if not specified)

section_description.default_value: Discover the rich history behind your wedding venue

kicker.description: Script accent text above the main title

description.default_value: Nestled along Minnesota's scenic Rum River, our historic barn offers the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern elegance for your once-in-a-lifetime celebration.

content.description: Location item content (use line breaks for multiple lines)

script_accent.description: Script-style accent text above the title

description.description: Lead description text below the title

date_taken.description: Original photo date if different from story period
